class.name: PreBuiltIndexJSONOutput
class.description: [PreBuiltIndexJSONOutput] contains either an error type or output data. Different output types contain different error information. [b]Note:[/b] Attempting to get information that is not supported by the current output type will generate an error.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns the data contained in this output type.

method.name: get_message
method.description: Returns the human-readable error message contained in this output type.

method.name: get_error
method.description: Returns the engine error code contained in this output type.

method.name: get_error_type
method.description: Returns the error type contained in this output type.

method.name: get_line
method.description: Returns the error line number information contained in this output type.

method.name: has_message
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this output type contains a human-readable error message.

method.name: has_line
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this output type contains error line number information.

method.name: has_data
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this output type contains data.

constants.constant: An error occurred in a built-in engine method. [b]Contains:[/b] Engine error code.
Error parsing JSON data. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message, error line.
Unsupported data type encountered. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message.
No file is currently open. [b]Contains:[/b] None.
No data is currently open. [b]Contains:[/b] None.
An error occurred while parsing a value. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message, error line.
Invalid number of lines for the jump marker. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message.
File header format error. [b]Note:[/b] A missing file header will return [constant ERR_FORMAT]. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message.
File format version mismatch. [b]Contains:[/b] Error message.
